scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../FullStack2022-Part2/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../FullStack2022-Part3/phonebook_backend && rm -rf build && cd ../../FullStack2022-Part3/phonebook_backend
scripts.deploy: cd .. && git subtree push --prefix phonebook_backend heroku main && cd phonebook_backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
